mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.cover, a.author, tc.name AS categoryName, a.origin, a.state, a.publish_time, a.edit_time, a.create_time, a.type, a.content, a.content_md, a.hits FROM tb_article a LEFT JOIN tb_article_category ac ON a.id = ac.article_id LEFT JOIN tb_category tc ON tc.id = ac.category_id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.cover, a.author, tc.name AS categoryName, a.origin, a.state, if(a.state='1', '已发布', '未发布') as stateDesc, a.publish_time, a.edit_time, a.create_time, a.type, a.content, a.content_md, tc.id as category FROM tb_article a LEFT JOIN tb_article_category ac ON a.id = ac.article_id LEFT JOIN tb_category tc ON tc.id = ac.category_id LIMIT #{start},#{size}
select id, title, date_format( publish_time, '%Y-%m' ) as `month`, date_format( publish_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as `day` from tb_article where state = "1"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_article(title, cover, author, category, origin, state, publish_time, edit_time, create_time, type, content, content_md) VALUES (#{article.title},#{article.cover},#{article.author}, #{article.category},#{article.origin},#{article.state},#{article.publishTime}, #{article.editTime},#{article.createTime},#{article.type},#{article.content},#{article.contentMd})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, title, publish_time , c.icon as bgIco FROM tb_article_tag t LEFT JOIN tb_article a ON t.article_id = a.id left join tb_article_category ac on a.id = ac.article_id LEFT JOIN tb_category c on c.id = ac.category_id WHERE t.tag_id = #{tag} ORDER BY a.publish_time DESC

select a.id, a.title, date_format( publish_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as `publish_time`, c.icon as bgIco from tb_article a left join tb_article_category ac on a.id = ac.article_id left join tb_category c on ac.category_id = c.id where a.title like "%"#{condition}"%" or a.content like "%"#{content}"%" and a.state = "1"
